Uses of Class
gui.Circle

  • Packages that use Circle 
    Package Description
    game  
    gui  

    • Uses of Circle in game

      Methods in game that return Circle 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Circle Truck.getCircle()
      Return the circle that represents this truck when it is drawn
      Circle Parcel.getCircle()
      Return the circle that represents this Parcel on the GUI
      Circle Node.getCircle()
      Return the Circle that represents this node graphically.
      Methods in game with parameters of type Circle 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Node.setCircle(Circle c)
      Set the Circle for this Node to c.

    • Uses of Circle in gui

      Subclasses of Circle in gui 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DraggableCircle
      An instance is a circle that can be dragged by the user on the gui
      Methods in gui that return Circle 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Circle Line.getC1()
      Return the first end of this line.
      Circle Line.getC2()
      Return the second end of this line.
      Methods in gui with parameters of type Circle 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double Circle.getDistance(Circle c)
      Return the distance between the centers of this Circle and c.
      Vector Circle.getVectorTo(Circle c)
      Return the vector from the center of this circle to the center of c.
      boolean Circle.locationEquals(Circle c)
      Return true iff the this circle has the same center as c
      Constructors in gui with parameters of type Circle 
      Constructor and Description
      Line(Circle c1, Circle c2, BoardElement r)
      Constructor: a line from c1 to c2 representing r and colored according to the color policy.
